Room.Name: Sunken Pirate Ship
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing on the starboard side, near the stern of the Snap Dragon.
Room.LongDescription: The Snap Dragon creaks and groans as it rolls slowly with the tide. The motion is almost enough to make you seasick, and you feel a little queasy in the stomach. A portion of the rail, which you were thinking of leaning over, is gone, evidently shot away during the battle with the Oceancrest Navy. Other than a few battle scars, the ship is really in quite good shape. Strange that marine life hasn't taken it over. It's almost like it's a living ship.
